conceptual_summary: This EJS template demonstrates rendering dynamic content on a webpage by passing data from the backend to the frontend. It uses EJS syntax to loop through a list of programs and display details such as program name, brief description, code snippets, and conceptual summaries. The page includes external CSS for styling, and Highlight.js for syntax highlighting of code snippets.

brief: Implement a function to copy code snippets to the clipboard using JavaScript.
conceptual_summary: This JavaScript function demonstrates how to copy the content of a code snippet to the clipboard. It retrieves the text content from a specified DOM element using its ID and utilizes the Clipboard API's `writeText` method to copy the text. The function handles errors gracefully by logging them and showing an alert if the copy operation fails.
